statements: SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT analyzed_date, feedback_text FROM SentimentAnalysis ORDER BY analyzed_date DESC
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE feedback_id = 1
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY feedback_id
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analyzed_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE analyzed_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK;
SELECT sentiment_score, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM SentimentAnalysis GROUP BY sentiment_score HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, analyzed_date FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE analyzed_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY analyzed_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customer_info INNER JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_info.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customer_info JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_info.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id
SELECT feedback_text FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_info JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_info.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_label FROM customer_feedback INNER JOIN analysis_results ON customer_feedback.id = analysis_results.feedback_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer INNER JOIN customer_feedback ON customer.customer_id = customer_feedback.id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback JOIN customer ON customer_feedback.id = customer.customer_id WHERE customer.customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer JOIN analysis_results ON customer.customer_id = analysis_results.feedback_id WHERE analysis_results.sentiment_label = 'Positive';
SELECT customer_name, email, sentiment_score FROM customer JOIN customer_feedback ON customer.customer_id = customer_feedback.id WHERE customer.customer_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT customer_name, email, sentiment_label FROM customer JOIN analysis_results ON customer.customer_id = analysis_results.feedback_id WHERE sentiment_label = 'Negative';
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData ORDER BY ID DESC;
SELECT CustomerName, Email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE CustomerID = 1;
SELECT FeedbackID, SentimentScore FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE AnalysisDate >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT CustomerName, Phone FROM CustomerDetails WHERE Email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT AnalysisID, PositiveFeedbackCount, NegativeFeedbackCount, NeutralFeedbackCount FROM AnalysisResults ORDER BY ResultID ASC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData ORDER BY Sentiment DESC, Confidence ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT CustomerName, Email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE Phone LIKE '%123%' AND CustomerName LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY CustomerName ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.AnalysisID, a.AnalysisDate, fa.SentimentScore, ar.PositiveFeedbackCount, ar.NegativeFeedbackCount FROM FeedbackAnalysis fa JOIN AnalysisResults ar ON fa.AnalysisID = ar.AnalysisID JOIN SentimentAnalysisData sad ON fa.FeedbackID = sad.ID WHERE ar.PositiveFeedbackCount > 10 AND fa.SentimentScore >= 0.5 ORDER BY fa.AnalysisDate DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT CustomerID, CustomerName, Email, COUNT(AnalysisID) AS AnalysisCount FROM CustomerDetails cd LEFT JOIN FeedbackAnalysis fa ON cd.CustomerID = fa.FeedbackID GROUP BY CustomerID, CustomerName, Email HAVING AnalysisCount > 3 ORDER BY AnalysisCount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT fa.AnalysisID, sad.Feedback, fa.SentimentScore, ar.PositiveFeedbackCount, ar.NegativeFeedbackCount FROM FeedbackAnalysis fa JOIN SentimentAnalysisData sad ON fa.FeedbackID = sad.ID JOIN AnalysisResults ar ON fa.AnalysisID = ar.AnalysisID WHERE sad.Sentiment LIKE '%Positive%' ORDER BY fa.SentimentScore DESC, ar.PositiveFeedbackCount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_type, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_category WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, sentiment_type FROM customer_feedback JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id WHERE sentiment_type = 'positive';
